Articles.Content:
Wow.

I am surprised by the poll result for now, 84% in favor of resources !

And I thought I was alone ^^

It would be nice if Squad don't put their resources system code too far away

Edit: I just read the Kerbal Kon summary, I am looking forward Squads future "friendly" resources plans, keep up the good work.

Edited December 16, 2013 by Athlonic
MP would be kind of fun though, I like the idea of collaborating with my friends to build massive space stations and bases. I just don't have the patience to do all the launches myself!!

Please feel free to continue the discussion on this and any other KerbalKon topics in this thread.

Thank you
